eshmun.gui.kripke.utils

Class LogicTextPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JEditorPane
              • javax.swing.JTextPane
                • eshmun.gui.kripke.utils.LogicTextPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class LogicTextPane
extends javax.swing.JTextPane
    This class represents an IDE-like TextPane for logic expression.

    This IDE-like environment gives the following functionalities:

    • Syntax Coloring
    • Syntax Error Underlining
    • Auto-Indentation
    • Auto-complete and Variable name helpers

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LogicTextPane.LogicDocumentListener
      Listener for document changes of a LogicTextPane (insertion, deletion, style-change), it also listens for caret movement.
      private static class  LogicTextPane.ParseTask
      This class represents a ParseTask, that is a task that runs in the background with the objective of parsing and formatting the text in the given textPane, the task also takes care of underlining matching parenthesis when needed (depending on the caret's position).

      • LogicTextPane

        public LogicTextPane(java.lang.String textLabel,
                     Eshmun eshmunInstance,
                     boolean allowCTL)
        Create a new LogicTextPane (IDE-Like text pane for Logic Expressions).
        Parameters:
        textLabel - the placeholder label.
        eshmunInstance - the main Eshmun frame.
        allowCTL - this pane accepts CTL as well as propositional logic statements.
